name: Dominions 4: Thrones of Ascension
summary: You are a God! You are master and ruler of a loyal nation. You have unimaginable powers at your disposal. You have claimed this world as yours. But there are others who stand in your way. You must defeat and destroy these pretenders. Only then can you ascend to godhood and become the new Pantokrator.
info:
• 中文名: 神域4：登神王座
